name: Oracle Java Tutorial Dark
description: Dark background for Oracle's tutorial and api for Java.
additional_info:
Version 0.6 September 2016
Added code comments
Replaced rgba with #HEX Colors whenever possible
Replaced color codes / rgb codes with name codes whenever possible
Text Color is now a light shade of gray
Background color is now a very dark shade of gray
Visited links are now a lighter shade of their respective color
Noscript tag is hidden
Added padding to pre elements (code blocks)
Boxed left navbar
Adjusted some colors
Added colored code blocks

Version 0.5 February 2015
